items.title: All Terrain
items.description: All-terrain tires offer drivers traction on- and off-road, and are typically used by light truck and SUV drivers who want a tire that's able to climb rocks and perform on the highway.

items.title: All Season
items.description: Most common: Good handle on dry, wet or snow

items.title: Highway
items.description: Highway terrain tires are commonly used on light trucks and SUVs that typically haul materials or need to conquer highways and some off-road terrains.

items.title: Winter
items.description: For snow, ice, and freezing temperatures

items.title: Mud Terrain
items.description: Mud Terrain tires offer drivers traction on off-road terrains such as mud, dirt, sand, gravel, and rock, and are commonly used on CUVs, SUVs, light trucks, and jeeps.

items.title: All Weather
items.description: Combines an All Season and Winter tire traits for strong traction year-round

items.title: Commercial Van
items.description: Also known as cargo tires, commercial van tires feature a C at the end of the tire's size and are built with durable, long-lasting materials to help drivers as they haul packages in pickup and delivery applications.

items.title: Performance
items.description: For sport/luxury vehicles and high-speed handling

items.title: 5% Rebate in Cart on Premium Brands

header.subtitle: Consistently rated as excellent by 245-70r17 drivers
Check out the sale price on this tire
Consistently rated as excellent by 245-70r17 drivers

content.body:
### Shop 245/70R17 Tire Size 245/70R17 is kind of a rarity; a tire that’s only found on vehicles like the Jeep Grand Cherokee and Jeep Wrangler. Drivers of Cherokees can usually do just fine with all-season tires, thanks to their balance of road manners, ride quality, handling, low noise and year-round traction. Tires like the Michelin Defender LTX M/S, Goodyear Wrangler SR-A, Nokian One H/T, and [Continental TerrainContact H/T](https://simpletire.com/brands/continental-tires/terraincontact-h-t) would all be great choices for all-season tires in the 245/70R17 size. Popular vehicles: 1992-1998 Jeep Grand Cherokee
1997-2007 Jeep Wrangler Jeep Wrangler drivers generally tend toward all-terrain tires (for the obvious reasons), and some of our favorite all terrain tires in 245/70R17 include the Toyo Open Country A/T III, Falken Wildpeak A/T3W, [Nitto Terra Grappler G2](https://simpletire.com/brands/nitto-tires/terra-grappler-g2), and General Grabber A/TX. Maybe you live in a part of the country that has hard winters and snow that lingers on the ground for weeks on end. Dedicated winter tires can get you through the white stuff safely, with the ride quality and handling you’d expect with a nice set of touring or all season tires. For winter tires in the 245/70R17 size, our recommendations might include the Bridgestone Blizzak DM-V2, Continental VikingContact 7, Yokohama iceGUARD G075, and [Hankook Winter i Pike (RW1)](https://simpletire.com/brands/hankook-tires/winter-i-pike-rw11). Whether you drive a Jeep Grand Cherokee, Jeep Wrangler, or something else, SimpleTire has a set of 245/70R17 tires that meets your needs at a great price!

info.title: Did you know?
info.body: A reliable brand is the #1 ask for most drivers. Here you can shop all the most popular brands and discover new ones – all tested, ranked and rated by our customers.
